item.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Dogecoin Slip Ahead Of Fed Rate Cut Decision: Analyst Predicts 'Short-Term Dip' For ETH Before $10,000 Move
item.description: Leading cryptocurrencies fell on Sunday, while stock futures rose, as investors awaited the Federal Reserve’s decision on rate cuts. read more

item.title: Donald Trump Lauds Economic Success, Yet Public Sentiment Tells A Different Story
